channel.title: Can someone plz explain where run&compile is
channel.description:
can someone plz explain where run&compile is, because if u go to this post and if u go to the end, it sais go to run&compile and then add the codes... plz tell me where to go to find rune&compile
heres the post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,643.0.html

item.title: Can someone plz explain where run&compile is
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

[quote=“ChillScape!, post:5, topic:20340”]“Dawigg” Wow you cant even anser the simplist question!!! All the ansers today with you were like wayyy of track!!
Ok all you do is if you odnt have a compile and run bat do this open up a notpade and put this in it:“this is for the compile.bat”

[quote]@ECHO OFF
echo “Server Name here”
title “server title here”
color 4a
javac *.java
pause[/quote]
Ok that was from the top of my head then save that into your compile bat put the name as MUST PUT THE NAME AS’;

Compile.bat

Then for the run.bat open another notepad and put this in it:

[quote]@echo off
echo “message here” “anything you want can go here”
title “server name here”
color 4a
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
[/quote]
Then you must save that in your server and YOU MUST SAVE IT AS!;

Run.bat

Then you are done!!! Have fun!!![/quote]

your stupid he asked where to find it so plz dont flame me i usually know what im doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone plz explain where run&compile is
item.dc:creator: @ChillScape ChillScape!
item.description:
@ChillScape wrote:

“Dawigg” Wow you cant even anser the simplist question!!! All the ansers today with you were like wayyy of track!!
Ok all you do is if you odnt have a compile and run bat do this open up a notpade and put this in it:“this is for the compile.bat”

@ECHO OFF echo "Server Name here" title "server title here" color 4a javac *.java pause
Ok that was from the top of my head then save that into your compile bat put the name as MUST PUT THE NAME AS';
Compile.bat
Then for the run.bat open another notepad and put this in it:
@echo off echo "message here" "anything you want can go here" title "server name here" color 4a java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
Then you must save that in your server and YOU MUST SAVE IT AS!;
Run.bat
Then you are done!!! ;) Have fun!!!

Read full topic
